Sentencas: Chromium-deficient Nd0.75Sr0.25Cr1-delta O3 (0.02 <= delta <= 0.06) solid solutions were prepared using a conventional solid-state reaction.
Titulo: Sintering, transport properties and thermal expansion of Cr-deficient Nd0.75Sr0.25Cr1-δO3 solid solutions

Sentencas: The effects of chromium-deficiency content on sintering, transport properties and thermal expansion of the solid solutions were investigated.
Titulo: Sintering, transport properties and thermal expansion of Cr-deficient Nd0.75Sr0.25Cr1-δO3 solid solutions

Sentencas: The results showed that all the solid solutions present single phase orthorhombic perovskite structure at room temperature.
Titulo: Sintering, transport properties and thermal expansion of Cr-deficient Nd0.75Sr0.25Cr1-δO3 solid solutions

Sentencas: The cell volume and the electrical conductivity of Nd0.75Sr0.25Cr1-delta O3 solid solutions decrease with the increase of Cr vacancy content.
Titulo: Sintering, transport properties and thermal expansion of Cr-deficient Nd0.75Sr0.25Cr1-δO3 solid solutions

Sentencas: The Nd0.75Sr0.25Cr0.98O3 sample exhibits the best properties.
Titulo: Sintering, transport properties and thermal expansion of Cr-deficient Nd0.75Sr0.25Cr1-δO3 solid solutions

Sentencas: The relative density is 95.5%, and the electrical conductivity and thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) reach 18.8 S cm(-1) at 850 degrees C and 9.62 x 10(-6)
Titulo: Sintering, transport properties and thermal expansion of Cr-deficient Nd0.75Sr0.25Cr1-δO3 solid solutions

Sentencas: K-1 in the temperature range of 30-1000 degrees C in air, respectively.
Titulo: Sintering, transport properties and thermal expansion of Cr-deficient Nd0.75Sr0.25Cr1-δO3 solid solutions

Sentencas: Compared with Nd0.75Sr0.25CrO3, TEC of the Nd0.75Sr0.25Cr0.98O3 sample is more compatible with that of yttria stabilized zirconia (10.3 x 10(-6) K-1).
Titulo: Sintering, transport properties and thermal expansion of Cr-deficient Nd0.75Sr0.25Cr1-δO3 solid solutions

Sentencas: Sintering, electrical and thermal expansion properties all indicate that Nd0.75Sr0.25Cr0.98O3 can be a promising candidate for interconnect material application in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Sintering, transport properties and thermal expansion of Cr-deficient Nd0.75Sr0.25Cr1-δO3 solid solutions
